name: Slinging Ink
description:
You can play this whole game without using your mouse (except for when you set your shop name)

ASD - body parts
HJKL- tattoo components
Enter/space - finish tattoo (Enter for general Okay/select)
RTY - quick business challenges

art (lines): Cheyenne Frykholm
art (background & colors): Ellian Ohn
programming (game logic): Drew Haymond
programming (networking & misc): Hina Sakazaki

music: Jeremy Su
